      • startEC

        public boolean startEC(AIRS_remote airs,
              String IPAddress,
              String IPPort)
        Start the EventComponent after being instantiated
        Parameters:
        airs - Reference to the AIRS_remote service which started this component
        IPAddress - String with the IP address to connect to
        IPPort - Port to connect to at the given IP address

      • run

        public void run()
        Runnable thread of this class for receiving methods from remote application server
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

        public void stop()
        Stop the EventComponent

      • registerEventServer

        public boolean registerEventServer(Callback callback,
                          String event_name_string)
        Register an event server with a given Callback for a given event name
        Parameters:
        callback - Reference to the Callback for this event
        event_name_string - String for the event name being registered
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • Subscribe

        public com.airs.platform.DIALOG_INFO Subscribe(byte[] TO,
                                      byte[] event_name,
                                      byte[] event_body,
                                      int body_length,
                                      int Expires,
                                      Callback callback)
        Establishes a SUBSCRIBE dialog
        Parameters:
        TO - byte array with the name to send this to (usually 'application server')
        event_name - byte array with the event name being subscribed to
        event_body - byte array with the event body
        body_length - length of the event body array
        Expires - time to expire in milliseconds
        callback - Reference to the Callback for this dialog
        Returns:
        DIALOG_INFO of the established dialog

      • Notify

        public boolean Notify(short dialog_id,
             byte[] event_body,
             Callback callback)
        Sends notification in subscription dialog
        Parameters:
        dialog_id - identifier for the dialog being used
        event_body - byte array with the event body being sent
        callback - Reference to the Callback being notified upon completion
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • Publish

        public com.airs.platform.DIALOG_INFO Publish(byte[] TO,
                                    byte[] event_name,
                                    byte[] event_body,
                                    int Expires,
                                    Callback callback)
        Establishes a new PUBLISH dialog
        Parameters:
        TO - byte array with the name to send this to (usually 'application server')
        event_name - byte array with the event name being subscribed to
        event_body - byte array with the event body
        Expires - time to expire in milliseconds
        callback - Reference to the Callback for this dialog
        Returns:
        DIALOG_INFO of the established dialog

      • Publish

        public boolean Publish(com.airs.platform.DIALOG_INFO dialog,
              byte[] TO,
              byte[] event_name,
              byte[] event_body,
              int Expires)
        Sends a PUBLISH method in an existing dialog
        Parameters:
        dialog - Reference to the DIALOG_INFO that holds the dialog information to be used
        TO - byte array with the name to send this to (usually 'application server')
        event_name - byte array with the event name being subscribed to
        event_body - byte array with the event body
        Expires - time to expire in milliseconds
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • Confirm

        public boolean Confirm(com.airs.platform.Method method,
              String ret_code)
        sends confirmation outside of any existing dialog, using the information from the old method
        Parameters:
        method - Reference to the Method being re-used
        ret_code - Return code being inserted into the CONFIRM method
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • Confirm

        public boolean Confirm(com.airs.platform.DIALOG_INFO dialog_info,
              String ret_code)
        sends confirmation within existing dialog
        Parameters:
        dialog_info - Reference to the DIALOG_INFO of the dialog being used
        ret_code - Return code being inserted into the CONFIRM method
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • Bye

        public boolean Bye(com.airs.platform.DIALOG_INFO dialog,
          Callback callback)
        Terminates existing dialog
        Parameters:
        dialog - Reference to the DIALOG_INFO of the dialog to be terminated
        callback - Reference to the Callback of this dialog
        Returns:
        true, if successful
